title: Regulation on nonconsensual towing; revise to include private motor vehicles.
subject: Transportation

extras.summary: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTIONS 63-37-1, 63-37-3, 63-37-5, 63-37-7, 63-37-9, 63-37-11, 63-37-13 AND 63-37-15, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO REVISE PROVISIONS RELATED TO THE NONCONSENSUAL TOWING OF VEHICLES TO ENSURE THAT THE AUTHORITY TO PERFORM SUCH TOWING IS APPLICABLE TO BOTH PRIVATE MOTOR VEHICLES AND COMMERCIAL MOTOR VEHICLES; TO RENAME THE "COMMERCIAL VEHICLE TOWING ADVISORY COMMITTEE" AS THE "VEHICLE TOWING ADVISORY COMMITTEE" AND LEAVING THE ADMINISTRATION THEREOF WITHIN THE COMMERCIAL TRANSPORTATION ENFORCEMENT DIVISION OF THE DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY; TO AMEND SECTION 63-3-915, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, IN CONFORMITY THERETO; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
